info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued July 13 at 1:31PM EDT by NWS NorthernIndiana
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of central Hillsdale County through 200 PM EDT... At 130 PM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm over Hillsdale, moving southeast at 30 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph and pea size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. This storm will remain over mainly rural areas of central Hillsdale County, including the following locations... Pittsford, Shadyside, Betzer, Osseo, North Adams, Lake Wilson, Ransom and Bear Lake. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.25 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
